Partners
Partners should also spend 
time holding and being close 
to the baby. They may feel 
a little left out, especially if 
they have to leave you and 
the baby in hospital and 
return to an empty home. 
They may need support 
and encouragement to get 
involved. The more you can 
both hold and cuddle your 
baby,	the	more	confident	you	
will all feel.
